alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Lorain; Medina; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect northeastern Medina...southwestern Cuyahoga...northern Summit and northern Lorain Counties Until 1100 AM EST.... At 959 AM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from near Amherst to 6 miles east of Brunswick, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Up to 2 inches of quick snow accumulation... Locations impacted include... Akron, Lorain, Elyria, Vermilion, Parma, Cuyahoga Falls, Strongsville, Brunswick, North Royalton, North Ridgeville, Kent, Hudson, Tallmadge, Streetsboro, Amherst, Macedonia, Grafton, Mogadore, Stow, and North Olmsted. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 305, 316, 327, 614, 616, and 617.
